CheckboxSettings.Name: Enable Logging
CheckboxSettings.Description: Enables or disables the logging console

CheckboxSettings.Name: Enable Fatal Logging
CheckboxSettings.Description: Enables or disables the logging of Fatal level messages

CheckboxSettings.Name: Enable Critical Logging
CheckboxSettings.Description: Enables or disables the logging of Critical level messages

CheckboxSettings.Name: Enable Error Logging
CheckboxSettings.Description: Enables or disables the logging of Error level messages

CheckboxSettings.Name: Enable Warning Logging
CheckboxSettings.Description: Enables or disables the logging of Warning level messages

CheckboxSettings.Name: Enable Info Logging
CheckboxSettings.Description: Enables or disables the logging of Info level messages

CheckboxSettings.Name: Prevent Close
CheckboxSettings.Description: If enabled, will prevent closing the console (either by deleting the close button or in other platform-specific way)

CheckboxSettings.Name: Shift-JIS Encoding
CheckboxSettings.Description: If enabled, console is set to the Shift-JIS encoding, otherwise UTF-8 encoding

CheckboxSettings.Name: Force TTY Driver
CheckboxSettings.Description: If enabled, forces to use custom Witchcraft TTY driver for handling terminal output on unix

CheckboxSettings.Name: Append Logs
CheckboxSettings.Description: Appends to the log file instead of overwriting, on game startup

CheckboxSettings.Name: Write To Disk
CheckboxSettings.Description: Enables writing log messages to disk

CheckboxSettings.Name: Instant Flushing
CheckboxSettings.Description: If enabled, instantly writes any received log entries to disk

DropdownSettings.Name: Console Out Redirect Type
DropdownSettings.Description: Fancy words for just how does the logging terminal open

IntegerInputSettings.Name: Concurrent File Limit
IntegerInputSettings.Description: The maximum amount of concurrent log files that will be written to disk
